snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York announcement teaser PC and Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/2QG4vzE
Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York presents the conflict between two vampiric factions: the traditionalist Camarilla and the fiercely independent Anarchs among the iconic landmarks and night lights of The Big Apple. It's a unique, atmospheric, single-player narrative experience, set in a rich, fully licensed, globally recognized universe of Vampire: The Masquerade 5th Edition.
Coming Q4 2019 to PC and Nintendo Switch.

Learn more information about the game:
- our website: http://drawdistance.eu/
- our Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/drawdistancedev/
- our Twitter: https://twitter.com/DrawDistanceDev
- our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/drawdistancedev/
- our Discord: https://discord.gg/8JBbSWU

Composed by Arkadiusz Reikowski.
http://arkadiuszreikowski.com/
